content_descriptors.notes:
Rated PG13 for:
-Blood and Violence
-Body Image and Self-Esteem Issues
-Childhood Trauma
-Death of Characters
-Depictions of Monsters/Monstrous Features
-Depression
-Hospitals
-Intrusive Thoughts
-Kidnapping
-Obsessive Compulsive Disorder
-Sexual References and Humor
-Suicidal Thoughts
-Toxic Parental Figure

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
